segments.lesson_summary: Summary of segment 1: In math class, we are learning about natural numbers in the thousands range. The decimal structure is important to understand, like how numbers increase and decrease by 10 and 100. It's also interesting to learn how the values of letters range from A to Z. In addition, we will be working with straight numbers and practicing different mathematical operations within the thousands range. Maths is an exciting subject that involves problem-solving and critical thinking skills!
